text.en: On the ever-so-supple surface of a blossoming hundred-petalled lotus
text.en-trans: dem dem chü kyé dabgya göpé khar

text.en: The ever-so-beautiful Sarasvatī, captivating with her signs and marks,
Is seated amidst a mass of rainbow light that is ever so brilliant:
text.en-trans: khyuk khyuk ja ö trikpé ü na zhuk

text.en: Direct your ever-so-dazzling smile of delight towards me.
text.en-trans: dzum dzum gyepé zhalré dak la chok

text.en: Your noble face resembles the full moon that is ever so bright.
text.en-trans: kar karda ba nya dré zhal zang ma

text.en: Your divine voice accompanied by the sound of thevīṇāis ever so sweet.
text.en-trans: nyen nyen tsang sung piwam dra dang drok

text.en: The love with which you regard all beings as your children is ever so tender.
text.en-trans: tsé tsé drowa kün la bu tar gong

text.en: Hold deluded ones like me, the ever-so-foolish, in your compassion!
text.en-trans: lün lün mongpa dak dra tukjé zung

text.en: May I master the fields of knowledge that are ever so numerous
text.en-trans: mang mang sheja rigpé tsok nam dang

text.en: And realize the ever-so-profound intent of the sūtras and tantras
text.en-trans: zab zab do dang gyüdé gongpé dön

text.en: With a mind that is ever so wise, skilful and excellent,
text.en-trans: khé khé puljung lo yi rab tok né

text.en: And raise ever so high the victory banner of the teachings.
text.en-trans: to to tenpé gyaltsen dreng nü shok

text.en: As, with the intention to lead all beings, ever so incalculable in number,
text.en-trans: drang drang drang kyi mi long khakhyab dro

text.en: To the supreme state that is ever so blissful,
text.en-trans: dé dé gopang chok la göpé lö

text.en: I strive ever so hard to complete the two accumulations,
text.en-trans: bé bé tsok nyi gyatsö tar sön té

text.en: Help me to become an ever-so-excellent guide, supremely victorious!
text.en-trans: lek lek namdren gyalwé wangpor dzö
